comments.body: The desired behavior here seems debatable to me—I think this `any` would have confused me before I learned about some similar quirks around quick info on assignments to evolving array types. There’s some sense in which hovering a variable to get quick info always feels like _reading_, even if the location is actually a write.
yeah but then we cant distinguish between getter or setter anytime.. so.. shrug.. i think type at that location seems like better than always assuming read which is what this PR does..
